nodes.bodyText: This seems like 2 calls  the UI service could do as well (or at least the setFxStage). What do you think?
Unrelated question: Why is there no return here? Or at least a log statement to catch potential user problems?
Could be replaced by Lomboks AllArgConstructor

Instead of collection and addAll you could do a foreach and add
Maybe extract the stream into a tiny method

The complexity of this class is very high and self-explanatory code is not given here anymore imho.
Either a Javadoc or some other kind of restructuring is necessary:

The parent is implicitly expected to be a list cell - but you only see this from the cast in line 23.
There is a onRemoveButtonClicked method, but nowhere is stated that this controller is supposed to contain a button. So the name is misleading here.
Also the purpose of the label remains unclear. What is "channel" supposed to be?
What is this value referring to? A translation code?
Thanks captain! Comment can be removed

A JavaDoc would be helpful here:
How is this different from a VBox?
When should this be used?
How to use this from SceneBuilder or fxml?
If only one case is covered I'd prefer if/else

From what I see mementos can never be null.
Also I'd suggest Arrays.stream(mementos).foreach(CacheMemento::cache)

From what I see mementos can never be null.
Also I'd suggest Arrays.stream(mementos).foreach(CacheMemento::restore)

nodes.bodyText:
Might to move to JUnit 5 which has full JUnit 4 backwards compatibility with junit-jupiter-vintage.
See API: https://github.com/FAForever/faf-java-api/blob/develop/build.gradle#L269
We should add an issue for that I guess.
How is changing to java 14 related to this.

commit.message:
Native window behavior and design brush-up

Fixes #1007
Fixes #1033
Fixes #1038
Fixes #1075
Fixes #1685
Fixes #1751
Fixes #1760
Fixes #1766
Fixes #1815
Fixes #1816
Fixes #1817
Fixes #1821
Fixes from Alex
Fixes from Alex
Fixes from Alex
Fixes from Alex
Fix Pagination Formatting
Fix X not displaying in vault details
Fix show rating change not enabling
Add correct icons to coop tab
Fix PasswordField getting no focus
Fix unit tests
Fix alert dialogs stretching over the whole screen

fixup! Native window behavior and design brush-up

Colorize selected language instead of using icon

fixup! Native window behavior and design brush-up

Use `game.create.generateMap`

fixup! Native window behavior and design brush-up

Apply hover effect only to hoverable cards

fixup! Native window behavior and design brush-up

Import colors.css instead of style.css

fixup! Native window behavior and design brush-up

Clean up code that validates the game title

Update to fxstage 0.7.3

Adds support for Windows display scaling

Improve map generator message keys

"game.generate" is too ambiguous.
Make card hoverable
Fix window not restoring correctly
